name: Turtle Cake
author: Helen Kluesner
instructions: Prepare cake mix as on package. Pour half of batter into a greased 9 x 13 inch pan and bake at 350Â° for 15 minutes. Melt caramels with milk and butter in a sauce pan over low heat stirring constantly. After the 15 minutes of baking pour melted caramels, 1 cup nuts, and chocolate chips over the cake. Pour remaining batter over this filling and sprinkle with remaining nuts and bake about 30 minutes longer.
